readability_reflection: concatenation seemed more readable to me because of the simplicity of it and the spacing being much more readable.
comprehension_debugging: with interpolation I would have to look back a few more times to make sure i was reading it correctly.
preference_rationale: concatention is what i would prefer because of how its similiar to what ive alrdy been using.
learning_curve: concatenation is what Im more used to in terms of day to day strings but interplotation is something ive also used here and there.
suggestions_improvement: not really I think it depends on the user for which they prefer.
